Author: bindingin
Text: Ughhh yess my bf’s family does this. His sister is ortho. I told her how I don’t eat breakfast or dinner lately, how it’s probably bad but I’m dropping weight .. she is like, no, it’s not bad! ‘We don’t need that much food!’   Off topic but every time I eat meat, dairy, sweets, (anything not raw veggie) in a small portion that I feel good about, she goes on and on about some fad diet like keto or IF or some shit. And I’m like biiiiitch I’m dropping weight and I like carbs you don’t have to lecture us.
